title: Defeated Parties (feat. Chloe Hilliard)
description: Dan recaps his trip to Miami and watching his team lose the Super Bowl. Chloe Hilliard shatters the pure image of the Barber Shop for everyone & Keren Hunter and Jay talk about their hallway interactions.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
